question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. yellow store sign on the left
B. yellow box sign on the right
C. None
D. None

options.A: yellow store sign on the left
options.B: yellow box sign on the right

triage_reason: The yellow store sign on the right is partially occluded by the bus and appears larger in the frame than the yellow store sign on the left, suggesting it is closer to the camera, but the perspective distortion and occlusions make this judgment uncertain without a depth map.
